content.title: ARABS and ARABIA: In the Christian Bible.

post: "Burden" = responsibility. God has imposed upon the Arabs, the duty to deliver His Message to mankind.
verses.verse: The burden upon Arabia.
...the villages that Kedar doth inhabit:
Arabia and all the princes of Kedar...
...he (Muhummed pbuh) shined forth from mount Paran (in Arabia), and he came with ten thousand saints.
...and I (God Almighty) will move them (the Jews) to jealousy with those (the Arabs) which are NOT A PEOPLE (a nonentity): I will provoke them (the Jews) to anger with a FOOLISH NATION

content.title: ABRAHAM: He wedded his own sister (Sarah.) (?)

verses.verse: Why saidst thou (O Abraham), she is my sister? So I might have taken her to me to WIFE... now take her (Sarah) and go thy Way.
And yet INDEED she (Sarah) is my sister (!)...and she became my (Abraham's) WIFE.
...and (she, Sarah) gave her (Hagar) to her husband TO BE HIS WIFE.

verses.title: Unfulfilled prophecy:
verses.verse: And I will give unto thee (O Abraham), the land wherein thou art a stranger, ALL THE LAND OF CANAAN (Palestine), for an ever-lasting possession; and I will be their God.

pre: Poor Abraham (pbuh) did not receive a single square foot of land FREE!
verses.verse: And he (God Almighty) gave him (Abraham) NO inheritance in it, NO, NOT SO MUCH TO SET HIS FOOT UPON; but he (God) promised that he would give it to him for a possession...

content.title: ABSURDITIES in the Book of God (?) the Holy Bible:

verses.verse: A TALKING ass.
FOUR footed fowls.
Birth of females a DOUBLE pollution.
Shamgar KILLS 600 with an ox goad.
Samson KILLS A THOUSAND with the jaw bone of a donkey.
A SEVEN HEADED leopard.
To eat SHIT and drink PISS.
DUNG on your faces.
To eat cake with SHIT.
Samson has SEX with a whore in Gaza.
Ruth COHABITS with Boaz in the barn.
David SLEEPS with a young virgin.

content.title: ALCOHOL : A devilish advice in God's (?) Book?

post: (From the "Good News Bible in Today's English")
verses.verse: Alcohol is for people who are DYING, for those who are in MISERY. Let them drink and FORGET their poverty and unhappiness.

verses.title: Alcohol recommended in preference to water!
verses.verse: Drink no longer water, but use a little wine for thy stomachs sake and thine often infirmities.

verses.title: What does the AA (Alcoholics Anonymous) say?
verses.verse: Alcohol is the Devil's handiwork says the...

content.title: APOSTASY: The apostate "thou shalt surely kill him"

verses.verse: ...neither shall thine eye pity him (the apostate), neither shalt thou spare him, neither shalt thou conceal him
But thou shalt SURELY KILL HIM: thine hand shall be first upon him TO PUT HIM TO DEATH...

content.title: BASTARD : This word occurs in the Bible THREE times.

verses.verse: The BASTARD shall not enter the congregation of the Lord; even to his tenth generation...
And the BASTARD shall dwell in Ashdod...
But if ye be without chastisement, whereof all are partakers, then ye are BASTARDS and not sons.

content.title: CIRCUMCISION : A perpetual pact with God -

verses.verse: He that is born in thy house, and he that is bought with thy money (your slaves), MUST needs be circumcised: and my convenant shall be in your flesh for an EVERLASTING convenant.
The uncircumcised to be "CUT OFF" (to be killed).

content.title: CONTRADICTIONS : In the Bible -

verses.verse: The "Lord" tempted David...
"Satan" provoked David...
700 Horsemen
7000 Footmen
Solomon had 2000 baths
Solomon had 3000 baths
Solomon had 4000 stalls of horses
Solomon had 40000 stalls of horses
Did Saul enquire of the Lord
...or didn't he?
Heaven, no man hath ascended
Elijah ascended
Enoch ascended
Jesus lost "None" of his disciples
He lost only "One"
"ALL" are sinners
Whosoever is born of God DOTH NOT commit sin...

content.title: DAVID : "Man after God's own heart" -

verses.title: Commits adultery with Bathsheba the wife of Uriah:
verses.verse: And David sent messengers, and took her (Bathsheba); and she came in unto him, and he LAY (had intercourse) with her...
David wickedly caused the death of Uriah, the husband of Bathsheba.

post: see in index under, "PROPHETS, but naked."
verses.verse: David shamelessly dances NAKED

content.title: GOD : God WITH A SMALL "g" :

verses.title: In Arabic, Hebrew and Greek there is no differentiation between a capital "G" for God, and a small "g" for god, as in the languages of the Western countries today; yet the Christians have played fast and loose when translating the Bible, i.e.
verses.verse: In whom the god (the Devil) of this world hath blinded the minds of them which believe not...

post: Compare the above with JOHN 1:1, where the Christians have used capital "G"'s and "W"'s when referring to Jesus.
verses.verse: And the Lord said unto Moses, See, 1 have made thee a god to Pharaoh, and Aaron thy brother shall be thy prophet.

content.title: GOD : His contradictory attributes -

verses.verse: No man hath seen God at any time
(God) whom no man hath seen, nor can see...
And he (God) said, Thou canst see my face: for there shall no man see me, and live.
And the Lord spake unto Moses face to face, as a man speaketh unto his friend.
And they (Moses, Aaron and seventy others) saw the God of Israel...
And Jacob called the name of the place Peniel: for I have seen God face to face, and my life is preserved.

verses.title: And as a special favour God shows his back parts to Moses:
verses.verse: And I (God) will take away my hand and thou shalt see my back parts...

content.title: GOD : Is not a fabricator of confusion -

verses.verse: For God is NOT the author of confusion...
...I make peace, and CREATE EVIL...
But the spirit of the Lord departed from Saul, and AN EVIL SPIRIT from the Lord troubled him.
And for this cause God shall send them a strong delusion, that they should BELIEVE A LIE.
